attributes.action: Help the self employed who are new businesses.
attributes.additional_details: Local small/new businesses are failing and struggling because the economy is now failing. If someone runs a luxury business for example Person Trainer. That person is suffering because their clients are being made redundant which in turn has a knock on affect to the Personal Trainer. I feel this needs to be addressed and help the smaller businesses that are trying to make a future.
attributes.background: It is all well and good helping the self employed businesses with grants and schemes, but for those who didn't do a tax return 2018/19 because they wasn't self employed by then we have absolutely no help other than UC.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/318435
